title: FRITTE / TARE MACHINE
description: Right next to the glass-doored fridge.

dialogueTree.title: Tare Machine: "The tare machine stands in the corn..."
dialogueTree.text: The tare machine stands in the corner. A sign says: "ONE BOTTLE = TEN CENTS".

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""Hm?" The clerk looks up, out of he..."
links.text: "Hm?" The clerk looks up, out of her magazine. "Oh. That's the tare machine."

links.title: Frittte clerk: "She knits her brow, confused. "It's..."
links.text: She knits her brow, confused. "It's... a machine for tare? You know. You find tare outside -- like, bottles or whatever -- and put it in the machine. Then it gives you money."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Cool. Let's do this swindle. This *..."
links.text: Cool. Let's do this swindle. This *tare* swindle.

links.title: You: ""I see. And how do I pick up tare f..."
links.text: "I see. And how do I pick up tare for the tare machine?"

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""You need a bag I guess? We used to..."
links.text: "You need a bag I guess? We used to have some but we gave them all out, so..." She shrugs awkwardly.

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""Feel free to use it if you find a..."
links.text: "Feel free to use it if you find a bag, though. I'm sure there are some... out there." She points outside. "Somewhere..."

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""Mh." She looks down, back into her..."
links.text: "Mh." She looks down, back into her magazine.

links.title: You: ""Excuse me -- I have the tare bag b..."
links.text: "Excuse me -- I have the tare bag but no tare. Can I still use the tare machine?"

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""No." She doesn't even bother looki..."
links.text: "No." She doesn't even bother looking up out of her magazine. "You need tare to use the tare machine."

links.title: Tare Machine: "Your bottles clunk into the machine..."
links.text: Your bottles clunk into the machine and the money appears with a satisfying jingle. You're a richer man now!

links.title: Inland Empire: "You're 100% sure you got special Ho..."
links.text: You're 100% sure you got special Hobocop money for that tare. At least +100% extra tare money. If the numbers on the machine told you otherwise, it's a *lie*.

links.title: Tare Machine: "Your bottles clunk into the machine..."
links.text: Your bottles clunk into the machine and the money appears with a satisfying jingle. You're a richer man now!

links.title: Electrochemistry: "D'you know what you should do with..."
links.text: D'you know what you should do with that money, kiddo? You should *buy more alcohol*! Enter the endless cycle of consumption!
